name: Bonanza & Baron Pilot Training
about: Bonanza & Baron Pilot Training (BPT) is a premier flying school specializing in type-specific training for Beechcraft Bonanza, Baron, Travel Air, Twin Bonanza, and Duke aircraft. With over 35 years of experience, our dedicated and world-class Certified Flight Instructors provide comprehensive in-person ground school and full-immersion training in your own aircraft. Our weekend clinics include recurrent training, Biennial Flight Reviews (BFR), and Instrument Proficiency Checks (IPC), ensuring you meet insurance requirements and FAA standards. We also offer a unique Non-Pilot Companion Clinic for spouses and family members. Our programs are designed to enhance your skills, confidence, and safety, making us the industry leader in Beechcraft pilot education. Join us for an unparalleled learning and social experience that sets you apart as a proficient Beechcraft pilot.
